class.name: ASAuthorizationController
class.brief_description: Manages authorization requests for Apple ID and other services.

signal.name: authorization_completed
signal.description: Emitted when the authorization request completes successfully. [param credential] is usually an [ASAuthorizationAppleIDCredential] or [ASPasswordCredential]. It can be null if the credential type is unsupported.

signal.name: authorization_failed
signal.description: Emitted when the authorization request fails. [param error] contains the localized description of the error.
